headline: Will Leadership Shifts Toward Life Sciences Reshape Healthpeak Properties' (DOC) Strategic Vision?
summary: In August 2025, Healthpeak Properties, Inc. announced the appointment of Denis Sullivan as Managing Director of Lab Investments & San Diego Market Lead, and the promotion of Mike Dorris to Head of West Coast Development & Construction. These leadership changes highlight Healthpeak's intensified focus on life science properties, aiming to build market share as sector conditions recover and specialized expertise becomes increasingly important. We'll explore how the addition of seasoned life...
